basic.description:
{Basic Leadership}

Increases morale & attack by 1 and casts Mirth at battle opening for 10 rounds

advanced.description:
{Advanced Leadership}

Increases morale & attack by 2 and casts Mirth at battle opening for 25 rounds

expert.description:
{Expert Leadership}

Increases morale & attack by 3 and casts Mirth at battle opening for 50 rounds
